description: YouTube is updating its policy on firearm videos in an effort to keep underage users from accessing potentially dangerous content, including videos showing homemade guns.
title: YouTube is implementing stricter rules around gun videos

description: In the race to buy TikTok, billionaire Frank McCourt is pitching investors with a chance to create a new platform that gives users the ability to control their own data.
title: Billionaire Frank McCourt's TikTok bid wins key backer as he looks past app’s prized algorithm

description: President Joe Biden told ABC News in an interview Thursday that he will accept whatever a jury decides in his son Hunter Biden's criminal trial and that he will not use his presidential power to pardon him if he's convicted.
title: President Joe Biden says he will not pardon his son Hunter Biden if he's convicted on gun-related charges

description: The Federal Trade Commission and the Justice Department are set to open antitrust investigations into Microsoft, OpenAI and Nvidia, examining the powerful companies’ influence on the artificial intelligence industry, a source familiar confirmed to CNBC.
title: U.S. regulators to open antitrust probes into Nvidia, Microsoft and OpenAI

description: Hallie Biden, widow of Beau Biden, is testifying about Hunter Biden's drug use and throwing out the gun that led to charges being brought against President Biden's son. NBC News' Ken Dilanian reports on the questioning she faced from prosecutors and defense beginning its cross-examination.
title: Beau Biden's widow testifies at Hunter Biden's trial

description: Hallie Biden, widow of Beau Biden, is testifying about Hunter Biden's drug use and throwing out the gun that led to charges being brought against President Biden's son. NBC News' Ken Dilanian reports on the questioning she is facing and her past romantic involvement with Hunter after Beau's death.
title: Beau Biden's widow testifies at Hunter Biden's trial

description: President Joe Biden shared a joke and a hug with one of the D-Day veterans that he met during an official ceremony to mark the 80th anniversary of the Normandy landings. Although the sound was indistinct, the warrior apparently asked Biden, "When do you sleep?"
title: Watch: Biden shares a joke with D-Day vet at Normandy event

description: The Israeli military launched an airstrike on a school operated by the United Nations in central Gaza Strip overnight, saying it was targeting Hamas.
title: Dozens killed in strike on Gaza school Israeli military says was being used by Hamas

description: World leaders and allied veterans gather to celebrate 80th anniversary of D-Day
title: World leaders and allied veterans gather to celebrate 80th anniversary of D-Day

description: A Palestinian-American software engineer sued Meta this week alleging that the social media company discriminated against him and unlawfully fired him.
title: Former Meta employee sues company saying he was fired after raising censorship concerns about Palestinian photographer
